name: Sketch What You See
description:
Sketch What You See is an exploration puzzle game where you play as Lily, who has been given a notebook from her Grandma. She's been instructed to visit the park and see if she can match the sketches to places her Grandma has visited in the park. 

Controls

WASDMoveSpaceJumpLeft ClickLift/Put Down NotebookQ/EPrevious Page/Next PageEPick Up Item

This was a project for a module on my degree and my first time using Unity and Autodesk Maya- Overall I'm happy with how it turned out given the time  I had to work on it (5 weeks) but there are still some bugs that need to be fixed.

Note: When playing the build, the FPS Controller Y- axis locks so you can only look left and right but in Unity, it works fine and I couldn't find a fix for this. The demo can still be completed with this restriction.
